item.text: “As for you, son of man, prophesy against Gog, and say: ‘This is what the Sovereign Lord says: Look, I am against you, O Gog, chief prince of Meshech and Tubal!

I will <st data-num="07725" class="">turn</st> you <st data-num="07725" class="">around</st> and <st data-num="08338" class="">drag</st> you <st data-num="08338" class="">along</st>;<n id="1" /> I will <st data-num="05927" class="">lead</st> you <st data-num="05927" class="">up</st> from the <st data-num="03411" class="">remotest parts</st> of the <st data-num="06828" class="">north</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">bring</st> you <st data-num="05921" class="">against</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>.

I will <st data-num="05221" class="">knock</st> your <st data-num="07198" class="">bow</st> out of your <st data-num="08040" class="">left</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st> and make your <st data-num="02671" class="">arrows</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">fall</st> from your <st data-num="03225" class="">right</st> <st data-num="03027" class="">hand</st>.

You will <st data-num="05307" class="">fall dead</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="02022" class="">mountains</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st>, <st data-num="0859" class="">you</st> and <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> your <st data-num="0102" class="">troops</st> and the <st data-num="05971" class="">people</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> you. I <st data-num="05414" class="">give</st> you as <st data-num="0402" class="">food</st> to <st data-num="03605" class="">every</st> <st data-num="03671" class="">kind</st> of <st data-num="05861 06833">bird</st> and every <st data-num="07704" class="">wild</st> <st data-num="02416" class="">beast</st>.
You will fall dead in the open field; for I have spoken, declares the Sovereign Lord.
I will send fire on Magog and those who live securely in the coastlands; then they will know that I am the Lord.
“‘I will make my holy name known in the midst of my people Israel; I will not let my holy name be profaned anymore. Then the nations will know that I am the Lord, the Holy One of Israel.
Realize that it is coming and it will be done, declares the Sovereign Lord. It is the day I have spoken about.
“‘Then those who live in the cities of Israel will go out and use the weapons for kindling—the shields, bows and arrows, war clubs and spears—they will burn them for seven years.

They will not need to take wood from the field or cut down trees from the forests because they will make fires with the weapons. They will take the loot from those who looted them and seize the plunder of those who plundered them, declares the Sovereign Lord.

“‘On that day I will assign Gog a grave in Israel. It will be the valley of those who travel east of the sea; it will block the way of the travelers. There they will bury Gog and all his horde; they will call it the Valley of Hamon Gog.

For <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">months</st> <st data-num="01004 03478">Israel</st><n id="1" /> will <st data-num="06912" class="">bury</st> them, <st data-num="04616" class="">in order</st> to <st data-num="02891" class="">cleanse</st> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>.
All the people of the land will bury them, and it will be a memorial for them on the day I magnify myself, declares the Sovereign Lord.

They will <st data-num="0914" class="">designate</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st> to <st data-num="05674" class="">scout</st> <st data-num="08548" class="">continually</st><n id="1" /> through the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st>, <st data-num="06912" class="">burying</st> those who <st data-num="03498" class="">remain</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="06440" class="">surface</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">ground</st>,<n id="2" /> in order to <st data-num="02891" class="">cleanse</st> it. They will <st data-num="02713" class="">search</st> for <st data-num="07651" class="">seven</st> <st data-num="07097" class="">full</st> <st data-num="02320" class="">months</st>.

When the <st data-num="05674" class="">scouts</st> <st data-num="05674" class="">survey</st><n id="1" /> the <st data-num="0776" class="">land</st> and <st data-num="07200" class="">see</st> a <st data-num="0120" class="">human</st> <st data-num="06106" class="">bone</st>, they will <st data-num="01129" class="">place</st> a <st data-num="06725" class="">sign</st> <st data-num="0681" class="">by</st> it, <st data-num="05704" class="">until</st> those <st data-num="06912" class="">assigned to burial duty</st> have <st data-num="06912" class="">buried</st> it<n id="2" /> <st data-num="0413" class="">in</st> the <st data-num="01516" class="">valley</st> of <st data-num="01996" class="">Hamon Gog</st>.
(A city by the name of Hamonah will also be there.) They will cleanse the land.’

“As for you, son of man, this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Tell every kind of bird and every wild beast: ‘Assemble and come! Gather from all around to my slaughter that I am going to make for you, a great slaughter on the mountains of Israel! You will eat flesh and drink blood.

You will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> the <st data-num="01320" class="">flesh</st> of <st data-num="01368" class="">warriors</st><n id="1" /> and <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> the <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> of the <st data-num="05387" class="">princes</st> of the <st data-num="0776" class="">earth</st>—the <st data-num="0352" class="">rams</st>, <st data-num="03733" class="">lambs</st>, <st data-num="06260" class="">goats</st>, and <st data-num="06499" class="">bulls</st>, <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="04806" class="">fattened animals</st> of <st data-num="01316" class="">Bashan</st>.

You will <st data-num="0398" class="">eat</st> <st data-num="02459" class="">fat</st> until you are <st data-num="07654" class="">full</st> and <st data-num="08354" class="">drink</st> <st data-num="01818" class="">blood</st> until you are <st data-num="07943" class="">drunk</st><n id="1" /> at my <st data-num="02077" class="">slaughter</st><n id="2" /> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> I have <st data-num="02076" class="">made</st> for you.
You will fill up at my table with horses and charioteers, with warriors and all the soldiers,’ declares the Sovereign Lord.
“I will display my majesty among the nations. All the nations will witness the judgment I have executed and the power I have exhibited among them.
Then the house of Israel will know that I am the Lord their God, from that day forward.

The <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st> will <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="01540" class="">went into exile</st> due to their <st data-num="05771" class="">iniquity</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="05921 0834">for</st> they <st data-num="04603" class="">were unfaithful</st> to me. So I <st data-num="05641" class="">hid</st> my <st data-num="06440" class="">face</st> from <st data-num="01992" class="">them</st> and <st data-num="05414" class="">handed</st> them <st data-num="03027" class="">over to</st> their <st data-num="06862" class="">enemies</st>; <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> of them <st data-num="05307" class="">died</st> by the <st data-num="02719" class="">sword</st>.
According to their uncleanness and rebellion I have dealt with them, and I hid my face from them.
“Therefore this is what the Sovereign Lord says: Now I will restore the fortunes of Jacob, and I will have mercy on the entire house of Israel. I will be zealous for my holy name.

They will <st data-num="05375" class="">bear</st> their <st data-num="03639" class="">shame</st> for <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> their <st data-num="04603 0834 04604">unfaithful acts</st> against me, when they <st data-num="03427" class="">live</st> <st data-num="0983" class="">securely</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> their <st data-num="0127" class="">land</st> with <st data-num="0369" class="">no</st> one to make them <st data-num="02729" class="">afraid</st>.

When I have <st data-num="07725" class="">brought</st> them <st data-num="07725" class="">back</st> <st data-num="04480" class="">from</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">peoples</st> and <st data-num="06908" class="">gathered</st> them from the <st data-num="0776" class="">countries</st> of their <st data-num="0341" class="">enemies</st>, I will <st data-num="06942" class="">magnify</st> myself among them in the <st data-num="05869" class="">sight</st> of <st data-num="07227" class="">many</st> <st data-num="01471" class="">nations</st>.
Then they will know that I am the Lord their God because I sent them into exile among the nations and then gathered them into their own land. I will not leave any of them in exile any longer.
I will no longer hide my face from them, when I pour out my Spirit on the house of Israel, declares the Sovereign Lord.”
